name: company-registration-system
description: A comprehensive full-stack web application for company registration and management

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"

author: Company Registration Team
